name.label: Group name*
name.placeholder: Add a new unique group name

delete-group.title: Delete Group
delete-group.message: Deleting a group does not remove any contact, but the contacts won't belong to the deleted group. Do you wish to move the contacts to another group?

remove-from-group.title: Remove from this Group
remove-from-group.message: Are you sure you want to remove this contact from the group?
remove-from-group.message_zero: Are you sure you want to remove this contact from the group?
remove-from-group.message_other: Are you sure you want to remove all ({{count}}) selected contacts from this group? Removing contacts is permenant and cannot be undone.

move-to-group.title: Move To Group
move-to-group.message: Are you sure you want to move all ({{count}}) selected contacts from this group? Moving contacts is permanent and cannot be undone.
